actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit a parent who supports a handicapped child to take a personal exemption for the child even though the child earns more than $750.

summary.text: Authorizes a parent who supports a handicapped child to take a personal exemption under the Internal Revenue Code for that child unless the child earns more than $6,000 per year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit a parent who supports a handicapped child to take a personal exemption for the child even though the child earns more than $750.
